steam_user_installed_dlc: If your game has DLC created for it, you can use this function to check and see whether the user has installed it before accessing any files associated with it. The function returns true if the player has the content installed, and false if the user does not, but note that the user must also own the DLC, so you should use the additional function of steam_user_owns_dlc() to check that it is owned as well before using it. Note that Steam IDs can be large numbers and so you may need to cast your ID value as an int64() before supplying it to the function.
